verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4468>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> came this <S%H1697>word<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1639>them;<s%> don't diminish a <S%H1697>word.<s%>

It may be they will <S%H8085>listen,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way;<s%> that I may <S%H5162>repent<s%> me of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I <S%H2803>purpose<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to them <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> If you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3212>me,<s%> to walk in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> before <S%H6440>you,<s%>

to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> whom I <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7925>you,<s%> even rising up early and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them,<s%> but you have not listened;

then will I <S%H5414>make<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> to all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

It <S%H3414>happened,<s%> when Jeremiah had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Why have you <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> This <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2717>desolate,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant?<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6950>gathered<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

When the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> they came <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s house.

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> This <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death;<s%> for he has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against this <S%H5892>city,<s%> as you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> to all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against this <S%H1004>house<s%> and against this <S%H5892>city<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that you have <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5162>repent<s%> him of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that he has pronounced against <S%H1696>you.<s%>
But as for <S%H3027>me,<s%> behold, I am in your hand: <S%H6213>do<s%> with me as <S%H5869>is<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and right in your <S%H3477>eyes.<s%>

Only <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> <S%H4191>that,<s%> if you put me to death, you will <S%H5414>bring<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on <S%H5892>yourselves,<s%> and on this city, and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants;<s%> for of a <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> This <S%H376>man<s%> is not <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death;<s%> for he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4320>Micah<s%> the <S%H4183>Morashtite<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> shall be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> as a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall become <S%H5856>heaps,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H3293>forest.<s%>

Did <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H4191>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> put him to <S%H4191>death?<s%> <S%H3373>Didn't<s%> he fear <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the favor of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5162>relented<s%> of the <S%H7451>disaster<s%> which he had <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H587>them?<s%> Thus should we <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against our own <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

There was also a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> of Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim;<s%> and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against this <S%H5892>city<s%> and against this <S%H776>land<s%> according to all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah:<s%>

and when <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> with all his mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death;<s%> but when <S%H223>Uriah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3372>it,<s%> he was afraid, and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

and <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor,<s%> and certain <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H4714>him,<s%> into Egypt;

and they fetched <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H223>Uriah<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> who <S%H5221>killed<s%> him with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> his dead <S%H5038>body<s%> into the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>common<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> was with <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> that they should not <S%H5414>give<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
